armas.descricao: An ingenius Gul rifle designed to harness energy from Pan crystals. Charge to fire a 3- shot burst.
It's a bad leader what cant trust those beneath her to do what's right-who fears treachery behind every smile. Even if she's sometimes right, that ain't no way to live a life.
A small-caliber submachine gun best suited for close range skirmishes.
An accurate semi-automatic pistol that can rapidly fire small-caliber bullets.
A mid-range Pistol Shotgun with a brisk fire rate and medium recoil Slower reload.
Astandard issue military spec sidearm known for its reliability and accuracy.
A powerful hand cannon witha low capacity cylinder. High damage and a heavy kick.
A high-caliber single-shot hunting pistol that inflicts heavy damage at mid to long range.
A suppressed small-caliber automatic pistol with medium magazine capacity and a high fire rate.
A classic six-shooter. Tough. Dependable.
An old antique pistol.
Fires a stream of nanomachines, dealing damage to enemies or healing allies for 3.15% of their Max Health per second. The nano-tech Turrets and Drones.
Projectiles return on hit or after reaching max range. Reloading retrieves shot projectiles. Max 5 fired projectiles. Infinite Ammo. Can overheat.
armas.moddesc: Cube Shield Generates a Cube Shield which absorbs up to 500 damage from incoming enemy projectiles. Lasts 15s. Reactivating fires the Cube Shield which damages enemies as it travels. Damage is increased if the Cube Shield has absorbed enemy projectile damage before firing. Mod Power Requirement: 1,000

armas.descricao: Fires an electrical stream that jumps to nearby targets within 7.5m, dealing 30% reduced damage per jump. Applies OVERLOADED, dealing 30 SHOCK damage every 5 seconds for 5.2s.
armas.moddesc: Drives electrified rods which tether to other rods within 10m. Tethers deal 20 SHOCK damage per second. Targets embedded with a rod take 20 SHOCK damage per second. They take 20% additionally damage per extra rod in the target. Damage is increased by 1.5% if linked to another rod. Rods in the same target will not link.

armas.descricao: Spews flames that apply BURNING which deals 250 FIRE damage over 10 seconds.
armas.moddesc: Fires an explosive round that deals up to 175 damage within 9m.

armas.descricao: Fires volatile grenades that explode on direct contact with enemies and deal AOE damage within 4m. Dormant grenades eventually explode and can also be shot to detonate early.
armas.moddesc: Fire a high-powered rocket that deals up to 200 damage within 2.5m.

armas.descricao: Fires a stream of superhot ACID gas which applies the CORRODED effect, dealing 300 CORROSIVE Damage over 15s. Killing targets CORRODED by Nebula spawns a gas cloud which applies its on-hit effect. Gas clouds lasts 2s and can be refreshed.
armas.moddesc: Unleash a swarm of Nanomachines that seek after enemies within 20 meters and repeatedly attack dealing 6 ACID damage per hit and applying CORROSIVE, dealing 100 ACID damage over 10s. Lasts 15 seconds

armas.descricao: A pistol infused with mysterious Fae magic. Rapidly fires 3-round bursts of energy. Trigger can be held to continuously fire.
armas.mod: Applies a Soul Brand to all enemies within 25m which lasts 25s. Enemies killed while bearing the Soul Brand leave behind an Echo which lasts 10s before returning to the Nightmare Realm. Echoes are drawn to any survivor who walks within 3m, granting 10% of Max Health on contact.
armas.moddesc: Soul Brand

armas.descricao: The last vestiges of a fallen sister, this mystical crossbow pistol has the ability to recall its bolts to heal the wielder.
armas.moddesc: Recalls bots which deal 30 damage when pulled from a target and when striking targets on their return. Recalled bolts grant 2% of Max HP. Recalled bolts can also overfill Sorrow by up to +5. Any additional bolts will be returned to reserves.

armas.descricao: Fires a fast moving projectile which explodes on contact. Explosion has no damage falloff.
armas.moddesc: Funnels all current Mod Charges into the next shot. Projectiles deal 65 direct damage and 65 Explosive damage in a 5m per Charge consumed. Explosion applies 75 BURNING damage over 10s per Charge consumed. Additional Charges consumed increase all damage by 5%. Max 5 Charges

armas.descricao: Fires rocket that deals AOE damage within 2m. Charging the weapon can load additional rockets.  (Max 3). Cannot Weakspot
armas.moddesc: Fires a cluster bomb which detonates on impact across 2.5m. each cluster deals up to 150 damage per explosion within 3.5m

armas.descricao: A pistol infused with erroneous properties. Fires energy, allowing the trigger to be held for continuous fire.
armas.moddesc: Applies Death Brand to all enemies within 25m. increasing incoming damage by 10%. Enemies killed while bearing the Death Brand leave behind an Echo which lasts 10s before returning to the Nightmare Realm. Echoes are drawn to any survivor who walks within 3m. increasing Weakspot Damage dealt by 10% for 10s.

armas.descricao: Fires heated bits of molten slag. Can be charged to fire a single explosive rod at the cost of causing damage to the wielder while charging.
armas.moddesc: Rapidly fire volatile needles that explode after 1.5s dealing 30 explosive damage. Deals additional damage to low health targets.

armas.descricao: Fires a tight grouping of World Stone slugs. Hits rip away a small portion of the enemy, sending it to another realm. Incapable of standard Mod Generation.
armas.moddesc: On Relic Use, Redeemer stores the wielder's equipped Relic effect within the weapon as a launchable payload. Upon firing, the payload bursts across 4m when contacting a human ally, or lays dormant up to 15s until an ally gets close. Max 1 stored Relic which cannot be  modified.

armas.descricao: A brutal drum-fed fully-automatic 10 gauge shotgun designed for close-quarters combat.
A fully automatic rifle with a medium capacity. Highly effective with controlled bursts.
A classic Tommy Gun with large ammo capacity and a slow reload. Poor initial accuracy which improves while holding down the trigger.
A double-barrel over/under shotgun modified to fire powerful slugs. High damage with a decent fire rate, but very low magazine capacity.
An accurate and deadly single-shot crossbow with a low sound profile.
An incredibly powerful 12 gauge shotgun with a wide spread. High damage, slow reload.
A high-powerfed long range bolt-action rifle with exceptional accuracy and a 2.5x magnification scope. Tap AIM to scope.
An extremely accurate, high-tech pulse rifle which shoots quick three-round bursts.
The Postulant grants these to those who can defeat him. None know why. Some suspect that the game is mere preamble—that perhaps the true game is what its players do next.
A well-worn lever-action rifle.
A powerful single-shot sniper rifle with excellent range and pinpoint accuracy. Comes with a 3x scope. Tap SCOPE to toggle.
A well-rounded lever-action rifle effective at most ranges, hampered only by a slow reload.
An experimental infantry support weapon used for prolonged suppressive fire. High capacity, long reload, and prone to overheating. Becomes more accurate while holding down the trigger.
Fires incendiary shells that apply BURNING which deals 30 FIRE damage over 3.0 seconds.
A powerful Pan crossbow designed for mid-range combat. Fires 3 bolts at a time.
Fires a hypercharged wide-arcing line that passes through targets.
armas.moddesc: Fires the compressed remains of a dying star. On contact or hit wit the primary fire, causes Supernova to explode for 150 FIRE Damage, and 350 BURNING Damage over 10s to all targets within 4m. Striking the Supernova with Aphelion's primary fire increases its explosion radius by 25% and damage by 50%, and spawns a massive shockwave that deals 300 FIRE damage and also applies the initial BURNING amount. Generates 1 Primary Ammo on fire.

armas.descricao: After charging, fires an accurate high-damage rail which penetrates any target. Each successful hit reduces the charge time by 0.1s and increases damage by 10% for 1.5s. Stacks 5x.
armas.moddesc: Brands a target for 30s. Branded enemies that die leave a Brand at their location. Reloading or Swapping detonates Brands dealing 275 damage. Additional Brands (3 Max) on the same target deal 50% damage. Slain enemies return 5-15% of Ammo and Mod power to the weapon

armas.descricao: The moon gives Fae their strength..or so the stories say. In truth, the Fae give Fae their strength, and the moon is but one inspiration.
armas.moddesc: Empowers the Bow for 15s. Arrows apply Moonlight to enemies for 3s. Enemies struck by Crescent Moon while Moonlit release a Moon Essence which returns 1 arrow, heals 5% of Max Health, and grants 15% Fire and Reload Speed for 5s. Basic Shots automatically become Charged Shots. Perfect Shots fire two arrows.

armas.descricao: A pinpoint accurate split-barreled rifle that fires two penetrating rails. High base damage, but cannot score Weakspot hits. Charge to fire
armas.moddesc: Conjures 3 sword fragments that encircle the wielder for 30s. Performing a Melee Attacks lets loose a Fragment which taints the blood of targets, causing all attacks from Deceit to register as Weaspot hits for a short period of time. Charge Melee attack fires all remaining Fragments at once, but they taint blood for a shorter duration for each throw.

armas.descricao: Fires tooth-like flechettes. When weapon reticle is fully compressed, flechettes apply 200 BLEEDING Damage over 10s.
armas.moddesc: Fires a devastating blast which penetrates through all enemies in its path. Deals 120 damage with a 25% Critical damage bonus, and 2x additional stagger. Bloodline damage increases by 50% for each enemy penetrated.

armas.descricao: A device forged of pure evil. Fires hardened bone shards at bonus stagger. Semi-automatic with a medium kick.
armas.moddesc: Enter the Nightmare Realm. Nightfall gains infinite Ammo, a 25% Fire Rate increase, 10% Lifesteal, and becomes fully automatic. The wielder becomes significatly harder to hit while moving. Disables other weapons and Skills for the duration, or until Dreadwalker is deactivated. Lasts 10s.

armas.descricao: An energy-based cutting tool that increases damage when focused ona target. Can overheat.
armas.moddesc: Forces open Plasma Cutter's heat vents dispersing all heat. While active, Plasma Cutter generates 50% less heat, and ramping damage cap is increased to 3x Damage. Overheats automatically when deactivated. Lasts 20s.

armas.descricao: A high-powered Bow which deals bonus damage to Weakspots. Can be charged for increased effect. Perfect release after Charge for maximum damage
armas.moddesc: Fires a powerful arrow which deals 30 damage and opens a 7m portal that rains down star fragments. Each fragment deals 50 damage within 4m. Lasts 6s.

armas.descricao: A strange device which fires a bouncing Energy Disc that can hit up to 5 enemies in close proximity. Damage is reduced with each bounce.
armas.moddesc: Calls down a Guardian Sword on enemies struck by an Energy Disc. Swords deal 100 damage and 3x stagger within 5m.

armas.descricao: Converted from experimental Dreamer tech, ideal for mid-range combat. Weapon becomes more accurate the longer AIM is held.
armas.moddesc: Banishes enemies or allies into another dimension for 4s. When Banish ends, enemies take 1.25x the damage from the Repulsor's primary fire for 8s Powerful enemies won't be banished, but will take increased damage from any Repulsor while debuffed.

armas.descricao: A old Fusion Rifle refactored to store and violently release energy in each shot. Can be charged for more damage. Perfect release after Charge for maximum damage.
armas.moddesc: Imbues shots with White hot FIRE. Hits apply BURNING, dealing 100 FIRE damage over 10 seconds. Lasts 20s. Hitting an enemy cause shots to fragment, automatically targeting nearby enemies. Fragments strike for 50% of the initial damage dealt and apply BURNING.

armas.descricao: Alien rifle that shoots high velocity beams which penetrate enemies. Equipped with a 2.5x magnification scope. Double Tap AIM to Scope.
armas.moddesc: Fires a highly compressed sphere which draws in objects and deals 50 damage on impact. When colliding with a target, a large Gravity Well opens and draws in objects for 4s. When the Gravity Well expires, it deals 375 damage within 10m. Adds 250 damage per enemy and divides total damage among all enemies.

armas.descricao: An exceptionally powerful single—shot weapon that deals bonus stagger damage. Must reload after each round fired.
armas.moddesc: Fires a rotten spore that releases a specialized gas cloud over 6m. Applies SLOW to enemies while dealing 15 damage per second for 7s. Grants HASTE to allies, which lasts 5s after leaving the cloud.

armas.descricao: An once-beautiful weapon, rumored to corrupt its wielder with absolute power.
armas.moddesc: Harpoon Mode: Fire Harpoon to mark target causing primary fire to become Homing Rounds dealing 15% reduced damage. Enemies hit by Homing Rounds build Influence. Recasting exits Mode. When Influence fills, Monarch automatically reloads and creates a shockwave, and wielder becomes a Tyrant, gaining 20% Increased Damage and Infinite Reserves. Lasts 20s.

armas.descricao: Fires concentrated sand. Sustained primary fire and Sandstorm hits apply EXPOSED for 1s. Max 15s. EXPOSED: Target receives 15% additional damage from all sources.
armas.moddesc: Launch a sphere of loam. Impact creates a 5m swirling storm of sand which seeks to center itself on an enemy and deals 225 Elemental damage per second. When Sandstorm‘s focused target dies, it will seek a new enemy within 10m. Lasts 15s.

armas.descricao: (description changes every time you open inventory)
Fires homing needles which deal 5 Explosive Damage after sticking for 2s. When 5 needles are stuck in a target at once, BLOWBACK triggers, dealing 50 Explosive Damage instead.
armas.moddesc: Disables automatic BLOWBACK, while increasing Thorn's Reload Speed by 25%. and fire Rate by 15%. Reactivating the Mod will trigger an EMPOWERED BLOWBACK, which detonates all needles at oncefor 100% additional damage. Lasts 20s.

armas.descricao: N'Erudian tool with low energy reserves that generates energy bolts. Charging turbines generates additional projectiles. Max 5.
armas.moddesc: Activate while a valid target is in-sights, marking it with quantum Entanglement. All Genesis projectiles seek to the Entanglement target after initial impact, dealing 50% of Primary Fire damage.

armas.descricao: A mysterious relic that fires super-dense penetrating rails. Can be charged to unleash violent levels of energy. Warning: Overcharging may have catastrophic results.
armas.moddesc: Activation stabilizes Monorail, increasing Charge Speed by 25% and reducing Recoil and Sway by 75%. Lasts 20s. Additionally, for each 5% of the Charge Meter filled upon firing, gain 1% Critical Chance and Critical Damage. Max 20%.

armas.descricao: Fires a hypercharged wide-arcing line that passes through targets.
armas.moddesc: Fires 5 shattered compressed remains of a dying star. On contact or when hit with the primary fire, Micronova explodes for 75 FIRE damage, and 200 BURNING damage over 10s to all targets within 2.75m. Striking the Micronova with Corrupted Aphelion's primary fire increases its explosion radius by 25%, damage by 50%, and spawns a shockwave that deals 150 FIRE damage, detonates any nearby Micronovas and applies the initial BURNING amount. Generates 1 Primary Ammo on fire.

armas.descricao: A pinpoint accurate split-barreled rifle that fires two penetrating rails. High base damage, but cannot score Weakspot hits. Charge to fire.
armas.moddesc: Fires a ring of spinning blades which penetrates targets as it travels up to 20m before returning to the weapon. While traveling, activating Windfall again causes the projectile to spin in place for up to 3s. Activating it once more will recall it. Enemies struck by the Windfall obtain Tainted Blood for 3s causing all attacks from Deceit to trigger as Weakspot hits.

armas.descricao: Fires high-powered nails. Limited magazine size.
armas.moddesc: While active, grants unlimited Reserve Ammo and increases Reload Speed by 30%. If the entire magazine hits a Weakspot, Merciless will automatically perform a quick Reload. Lasts 13s.

armas.descricao: Fully automatic mechanisms launch a bouncing Energy Disc that can hit up to 2 enemies in close proximity. Damage is reduced after bouncing.
armas.moddesc: Imbues the Arbalest with the power of Yaesha's corrupted guardian, increases Fire Rate by 20%, reduces Recoil and Sway by 25% and each disc impact with an enemy explodes over 3.5m for 69 - 207 damage. Lasts 15s.

armas.descricao: Black crystal weapon which increases Fire Rate as mod power is generated. Mod power slowly drains after 10s of not dealing damage.
armas.moddesc: Funnels all current Mod Charges into a powerful penetrating beam. The beam deals 100 - 300 damage and increases damage dealt, recoil, and beam thickness per Charge consumed. Additionally reloads 20% Primary Ammo per charge consumed. Max 5 Charges.
